      • readJsonFile

        public static JsonDot readJsonFile​(String filePath)
                            throws IOException,
                                   org.json.JSONException
        Reads a JSON file and returns a JsonDot instance
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to the JSON file
        Returns:
        JsonDot instance containing the JSON data
        Throws:
        IOException - if there's an error reading the file
        org.json.JSONException - if the file contains invalid JSON

                                 String filePath,

                          throws IOException
        Writes a JsonDot instance to a file
        Parameters:
        jsonDot - JsonDot instance to write
        filePath - Path where to write the file
        prettyPrint - Whether to pretty print the JSON
        Throws:
        IOException - if there's an error writing the file
